"...The rain will wash it off....."

Chad groaned. Not only was had he been peed on, but now he'd have to spend the night in this piss covered toy truck. Worst yet, everything outside the truck was covered in piss so he couldn't being anything in to make a shelter for himself. It was going to get cold.

An hour after the sun had set, Chad was huddled on the plastic seats of the truck. He wasn't shivering yet but there had been a definite drop in temperature. For the 100th time he wished he could've made it inside where it was warm. How did it come to this? Shrunk in his cousin's piss covered truck with rain coming any minute. Well, at least the rain would keep any predators at bay. It couldn't get any worst than this.

Then he heard a distant rumble.

Chad sat up. He counted to ten, another rumble. He counted to eight, another rumble. Much louder than before.

"Oh no...."

A thunderstorm. He normally liked watching and listening to thunderstorms, but at his size everything sounded louder. There was a loud impact as the first drop of rain hit the ground. Moments later more drops began to fall, hitting both the ground and the toy truck. Chad stuck his fingers in his ears and yelled in protest. Which of course was drowned out by a thunderclap. He wasn't going to get any sleep tonight. In fact, Chad figured he'd be lucky if he made it through the night with his hearing intact.

He'd had long nights before but that night was the longest he'd ever had. Who could say was worst, the torrent of water bombarding the truck or the blinding lightning flashes and thunder cracks? Or the cold? The storm didn't last the whole night but he couldn't say when he'd actually drifted off to sleep. But he awoke the next morning shivering. Thankfully the sun's early morning rays were quickly warming up the interior of the truck.

He sat up, his whole body ached. Ridged plastic seats do not make the best bed. Wiping away some of the condensation on the plastic window he looked about.

info.brief_description: You are visting Your cousins house when You suddenly shrink to 1 inch.
info.description:
You are visiting your cousins house when you shrink to 1 inch tall. Don't kill the main Character and no interaction with females. Main Character can be seen or not. Chad is invincible so he can't die, so feel free to let him get eaten. I prefer this to be an unaware and vore story primarily.

Main Character: Chad, 18

Cousins:
Nick 14 Blonde Hair Blue Eyes, very fond of Chad
Austin 10 Dark Brown Hair Blue Eyes, Chad and Austin have an "ok" relationship.
Luke 5 Brown Hair Blue Eyes, Hasn't seen Chad as much as the others. Not really sure who Chad is or what he looks like.
Others:
Uncle Mark 36 Brown Hair, Blue Eyes, gym goer and works out a lot. Not very happy with Chad right now.

Also People in the neighborhood can come in contact with Chad like friends of his cousin's or uncle, neighbors, or even animals as long as they are male can be in contact with Chad as well. May be taken to school with cousin's or anywhere they decide to take him. No one line chapters please. Have fun!
Gift points will be given for good chapters.
